feature_defs.trigger: immediately after you cast Divine Smite
effects: You can expend one use of Channel Divinity to distribute temporary hit points to creatures of your choice within 30 feet (including you).
The total temporary hit points equals 2d8 + your Paladin level, divided as you choose.
You always have the spells in the Oath of Glory Spells table prepared at the paladin levels shown.
You can expend one use of Channel Divinity to gain benefits for 1 hour.
You have advantage on Strength (Athletics) and Dexterity (Acrobatics) checks.
Your long and high jump distances increase by 10 feet (this extra distance costs movement as normal).
When an ally enters your Aura of Protection for the first time on a turn or starts their turn there, their speed increases by 10 feet until the end of their next turn.

feature_defs.trigger: when you or a creature you can see within 10 feet is hit by an attack roll
effects: You can grant a bonus to the target’s AC against that attack equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum +1), potentially causing it to miss.
If the attack misses, you can make one weapon attack against the attacker as part of the same reaction (if in range).
limits: You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum 1), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

effects: Charismatic: you have advantage on all Charisma checks.
Saving Throw Reroll: when you fail a saving throw, you can reroll it (reaction) and must use the new roll.
Unerring Strike: once on each of your turns when you miss with a weapon attack, you can cause that attack to hit instead.
limits: Once you use this feature, you can’t use it again until you finish a long rest.
You can restore your use of this feature by expending a level 5 spell slot (no action required).
